ModMetaData.name: Audrey's Styles: Industrial
ModMetaData.author: Audrey
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new Ideology style suitable for industrialized colonies.
This style category affects: - Metal floor - Standing lamp - Standing darklamp - Table (1x2) - Table (2x2) - Table (2x4) - Table (3x3) - Stool - Flak Helmet - Recon Helmet - Cataphract Helmet - Ideogram - Ritual ambience sound
Credits: Mike Koenig's Industrial Sounds, modified for use as a ritual ambience sound and licensed for non-commercial use. https://soundbible.com/610-Industrial-Sounds.html# Simon Mathewson's angst, modified for use as a ritual ambience sound and licensed for non-commercial use. https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Simon_Mathewson/cessation/angst-1
